Rule.name: Make the initiator and responder stop dating (emotionless, possible amicable, breakup)
Must be dating first before break-up.

InfluenceRule.name: Impulsive people are less likely to have emotionless breakups
Loyal people are less likely to have emotionless breakups
Mean people are less likely to have emotionless breakups
Humble people are more likely to have reasonable breakups
Pacifists don't want to cause trouble
Emotional people are less likely to have emotionless breakups
Swingers are more casual about breaking up
Jealous people are more likely to have dramatic breakups
Vengeful people have more brutal breakups
Honest people are more likely to have smoother breakups
People have chill breakups withpeople they're buddies with
People who are dating And friends are more likely to have an emotionless breakup
If i doesn't like r and r is angry at i, they realize it's time to break up
If i doesn't like r and r is annoyed i, they realize it's time to break up
If i doesn't like r and r is annoyed i, they realize it's time to break up
Loving people don't take emotionless breakups
Dumb people don't understand when they're being broken up with
Breaking up is no big deal for sex magnets
Arrogant people don't like being broken up with
People who are afraid of commitment are more willing to break up
Pacifists are willing to accept emotionless breakups
Weaklings don't question getting broken up with
Loyal people don't like it when people break up with them without care
Oblivious people don't realize they're getting broken up with
Desperate people don't let other people go, especially without drama
People who feel out of place and still have interest don't want to let their boyfriend go
People who are lonely and still have interest don't want to let their boyfriend go
If r is angry at i, r is more willing to accept a breakup
If r is arrogant and angry at i, r is unwilling to accept the breakup
r is annoyed with i and thus is more willing to break up
r is cheating and thus doesn't care much about the relationship
Emotional people who are being cheated on Will Not Go Down Easy
If r doesn't like i then get out
If r doesn't like i but has high buddy, then emotionless breakup is good
if r doesn't like i but they are friends, emotionless breakup is good
past misunderstandings make the responder more likely to accept

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to break up with %r%, but %prons(r,he/she)% didn't believe %pron(i,him/her)%
%i% broke it to %r% that %prons(i,he/she)% liked %o% more than %pron(r,him/her)%
%list(i,r,and)% were pretty casual about breaking up
%r% had been getting really sick of %pron(r,his/her)% relationship with %i% but %pron(r,was/were)%n't sure how to end up
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% too into %i% for %pron(i,him/her)% to break up with %pron(r,him/her)%
%list(i,r,and)% decided it just wasn't working out
%i% asked %r% how %prons(r,he/she)% would hypothetically feel if %prons(i,he/she)% hypothetically broke up with %pron(r,him/her)%
%i% let down %r% with a beautiful haiku
%i% tried to break up with %r% in the form of haiku, but %rs% overinterpreted his meaning
%i% asked %r% to visualize %pron(r,him/her)%self out of %pron(i,his/her)% life

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%. %random(It's over.,I don't want to see you any more.,You were a mistake. Sorry.,I just can't do this... us... any more.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What...!? %random(Are you serious?,How could you do this to me?,I thought you loved me!,How could you be so cruel!,After all we've been through!?,My mother warned me about people like you!)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just think we need %random(to see other people,to spend some time apart,to rediscover who we are)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I always knew you were a %random(freak,jerk,loser,lame-o,space-case)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. So...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So what? %random(So happy to see me,So am I doing anything later?)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhhh no. Actually, I was thinking %random(we shouldn't be together any more.,we should probably break this off.,we should probably break up.,I should probably stop seeing you.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, stop it. You know %random(,you can't live without me,I'm the only one for you)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%. This is hard to say, but you only get one senior prom, and I don't want to spend it with the wrong person.
The thing is... I kind of like %o% more than you. And I don't want our relationship to get in the way of pursuing that.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Funny, I met someone new the other day too.
%gender(i,His,Her)% name is %random(SCREW YOU,GO DIE,BURN IN HELL)%!!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'll just go.
I've been thinking.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Us... I really don't think this is working.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, it's really not...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Call it off?

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - r doesn't actually care too much Accept

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, %sweetie%! I'm so glad to see you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh.. really..?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm *always* really happy to see you! You're my best %gender(i,boy,girl)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What if I told you that I was, like, thinking we stop seeing each other...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? Oh, well that's actually a relief. I was getting kind of sick of you but didn't really know how to bring it up.

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i tries to break it off easy with r but feels bad since r likes i so much Reject

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh hey there %sweetie%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, I was just thinking about... us.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I love thinking about us! I Love it! Like me... and you... together. Us! I don't know what I'd do if I didn't have us! I really don't. I'd have nothing. Haha. Yayyyy us!
So what were *you* were thinking?

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i and r agree, it's over Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So, what would you do if I told you that I didn't want to see you anymore?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I would agree and walk away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So how about that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sounds good.

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i presents a hypothetical Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: If I told you that I didn't really want to date you any more... what would y-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'd cry. A lot.
So many tears.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Good thing it was hypothetical, then! haha...

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i Really likes his dog Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So the other day I was with my dog, right.
And we were just sitting on my bed and hanging out, right.
And he made me so happy, I kind of realized something...
I like him more than you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ... Well, I suppose that's only-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: A lot more.
He actually provides useful services. And likes it when I pet him. And doesn't smell like a-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I get it.

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i writes a haiku Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, I wrote you a poem.
Yeah, I hope you like haikus...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: 'A heart devoted Settles unwanted besides Disinterested love'
Are you, uh, disinterested love?
I suppose that's that, then...

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i writes a haiku Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How do you feel about haiku?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I love haiku, %sweetie%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Good, I wrote one for you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: 'A heart devoted Settles unwanted besides Disinterested love'
I love it! I had no idea you were a poet!
I really love how fully it captures the sorrow and agony of unrequited love, how one's love may triumph over the apathy of another! How one may place oneself, immovable, in another's life! Beautiful!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, I'm glad you understand it so thoroughly...

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i is starting over Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Today, I'm turning my life around!
I don't like the direction I'm headed and I'm going to change it!
And I need to start with a clean slate, so I've made a list!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: A list?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: A list of the things I no longer need, the things that are keeping me down!
And you know what's at the top of that list?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I suppose I should have seen that coming...

Instantiation.name: It'sOver! - i wants you to imagine Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I want you to imagine something.
Picture a room.
You're in this room, the room is named %ip% life.
The room is wonderful, unique and interesting. You're very impressed with this room.
Now in this room, there is a door. Walk through the door.
Just walk out the door and keep walking. Go far, far away. Far away. And don't turn around.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I get it.
